resources.name: API Hateoas com Swagger, JWT v1
resources.description: This api manager end points for movies

resources.name: Authenticates a user and returns a token
Finds all movies sorted by name
Finds all movies sorted by rate
Add a vote for a movie
Finds all user not admin, actives
